name: simple-swf
description: Actually simple API layer for AWS SWF

scripts.test: mocha build/test/*Test.js build/test/**/*Test.js && npm run lint
scripts.build-full: npm run clean && npm run tsd && tsc
scripts.tsd: npm run tsd-clean && tsd reinstall && tsd rebundle && tsd link
scripts.coverage: npm run build && istanbul cover _mocha --  build/test/*Test.js build/test/**/*Test.js
